entry.title: convertstring
entry.content:
{% highlight c %}

char * p = "abcdefghi";

unsigned long len = (unsigned long)strlen((const char*)p);
unsigned long myl = len / 2;

char * k = (char *)malloc(len);
k = strdup((const char*)p);

for (int i = 0; i < myl; i++) {
    char c = p[i];
    memcpy(k+i,(p+len-i-1),1);
    memcpy((k+len-i-1),&c,1);
}

p = k;
free(k);
k = NULL;
printf("%s\n",p);

{% endhighlight %}
